0.62.name: wordpress/wp-folksonomy
0.62.description: This plugin allows your readers (either registered users or all) to add tags to your posts. Tags can be held for approval or displayed immediately. An RSS feed for monitoring new tags is provided. Javascript autocompletion is available to help improve tagging consistency.
